biotools.summary: TAMPA (Taxonomic metagenome profiling evaluation) , is a robust and easy-to-use method that allows scientists to easily interpret and interact with taxonomic profiles produced by the many different taxonomic profiler methods beyond the standard metrics used by the scientific community.

bioschemas.name: TAMPA
bioschemas.summary: TAMPA (Taxonomic metagenome profiling evaluation) , is a robust and easy-to-use method that allows scientists to easily interpret and interact with taxonomic profiles produced by the many different taxonomic profiler methods beyond the standard metrics used by the scientific community.
